N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.123 - BUS TURN Sign (NYW9-25)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The BUS TURN (NYW9-25) sign (see Sign Drawing SD-W38)
may be used to warn of locations at which buses regularly turn around. Guidance: 02 The BUS TURN sign should be used only where terrain and
roadway features limit approach sight distance and it is impractical to move
the turning point to a more visible location. Notes
